title: Implement tsk create in Rust
description: Implement CLI create in Rust with clap. Match Python behavior exactly.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: implement tsk create in Rust mirroring Python behavior. Acceptance: create command, issue file writing, validation, and step definitions for issue creation feature.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented Rust tsk create (CLI + issue creation helpers), project marker loader, issue file helpers, and issue creation steps. Ran: cd rust && cargo test

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented Rust tsk create workflow, project marker loader, issue file helpers, CLI output capture, and Rust step definitions for create/show/update/close/delete features to maintain spec parity. Ran: cd rust && cargo test; python tools/check_spec_parity.py
